name: Interaction Callback Type
description: Not available for MODAL_SUBMIT and PING interactions.

props.name: CHANNEL_MESSAGE_WITH_SOURCE
props.description: respond to an interaction with a message

props.name: DEFERRED_CHANNEL_MESSAGE_WITH_SOURCE
props.description: ACK an interaction and edit a response later, the user sees a loading state

props.name: DEFERRED_UPDATE_MESSAGE
props.description: for components, ACK an interaction and edit the original message later; the user does not see a loading state

props.name: UPDATE_MESSAGE
props.description: for components, edit the message the component was attached to

props.name: APPLICATION_COMMAND_AUTOCOMPLETE_RESULT
props.description: respond to an autocomplete interaction with suggested choices

props.name: MODAL
props.description: respond to an interaction with a popup modal
